document.full_text: japan will take control of tokyo electric power co , the operator of a stricken nuclear plant, in the face of mounting public concerns over the crisis and a huge potential compensation bill, a local newspaper reported on friday.
document.title: japan to bail out stricken nuclear plant operator
lines_and_colors: japan will take control of tokyo electric power co , the operator of a stricken nuclear plant, in the face of mounting public concerns over the crisis and a huge potential compensation bill, a local newspaper reported on friday.
